UiRealTimeCommunicator

A strongly-typed TypeScript client for seamless communication with a C# .NET 8 server using SignalR.

No need to manually define client-side message contracts. Just plug and play!

Simple, fast, low risk of errors.

GitHub Repository NuGet Library CLI Tool

What is it?

UiRealTimeCommunicator is a NuGet library / CLI designed to facilitate strongly-typed message exchange between a C# server and a TypeScript client (built on SignalR). It abstracts the complexities of WebSocket communication, providing a strict type-safe environment for implementing real-time features like live updates, notifications, and interactive interactions.

Why Use It?

Our goal is to offer a library that allows for a quick start, reducing boilerplate code, abstracting implementation details, and maximizing development speed. It is ideal for pet projects, MVPs, and production-ready applications that require rapid and reliable client-server interaction.
